evidence.claim: Connected Health Care utilizes AWS and Azure for cloud infrastructure.
The company supports interoperability standards such as FHIR and HL7.
Connected Health Care integrates with electronic health records (EHR) and uses X12 transaction sets for healthcare data exchange.
Utilizes Kafka for real-time data processing and streaming.
Their platform adheres to HIPAA regulations ensuring the security of patient data.

icp.icp_reason: Company supports X12 transactions and values API automation for healthcare data exchange.
